description: This file serves as the main entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports core React libraries, CSS styling, and the main App component. It initializes the React rendering process by mounting the App component into a DOM element with the id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the React component tree into the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM at the specified root.
